item.description:
Our March Meeting will be your chance to find out how to finance your investment property! We are having a finance panel as our guest speakers. Find out everything you ever wanted to know about getting money for your investments. The panel is there to answer your questions and help you get the financing you need (when you need it).
Don't miss this one, it's your chance to get the inside info from the professionals who are in it everyday!
RSVP today. And remember to bring your notebooks because there will be a lot of info!

Search for investment properties online at [url=http://www.ListRightRealEstate.com]http://ListRight... Real Estate

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Metro West Investors. Real Estate Group April Meetup
